焫字的基本解释

焫
ruò
古同“爇”，点燃；焚烧：“若举炎火以焫飞蓬。”
中医指用火烧针以刺激体表穴位：“藏寒生满病，其治宜灸焫。”

焫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruò］［rè］
［《廣韻》如劣切，入薛，日。］
(1)焚烧。
(2)中医的一种疗法。用火烧针（或砭石、艾绒）以刺激体表穴位。

焫字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　焫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页674第17
【廣韻】【集韻】如劣切【韻會】【正韻】儒劣切，?音呐。【玉篇】本作?。燒也。【禮·效特牲】卽奠，然後焫蕭合羶薌。【戰國策】秦（以下缺失一十九字）多一畫，今以廣韻爲正。

焫字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
焫字的起名意思

暂无。

焫
Basic explanation of words
焫
ruò
Gu Tong "fired", lit; burned: "If you raise the flames, you can burn the flying tents."
Traditional Chinese medicine refers to burning needles to stimulate acupuncture points on the body surface: "If Tibetan cold is full of illness, moxibustion should be used to treat it."
焫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ruò］［rè］
["Guangyun" is like a bad cut, enter Xue, day. ]
(1) Incineration.
(2) A treatment of Chinese medicine. Use fire needles (or Bianstone, Moxa) to stimulate acupuncture points on the body surface.
焫
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　焫; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 674 Page 17
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Such as inferior cut [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Confucianism is inferior,? Yinna. [Jade articles] This work?. Burn also. 【Rite·Effective Sacrifice】卽荽荽，and then 焫菫合膻芗. [Warring States Policy] Qin (19 characters missing below) has one more painting, and now it is based on Guangyun.
